Class Data

java.lang.Object
  transmissions.Data
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataConstants, Saveable
Direct Known Subclasses:

public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataConstants, Saveable

This class is responsible for all the data in transmissions.

Author:
Niels Thykier

generateXMLElement

public org.w3c.dom.Element generateXMLElement(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
Description copied from interface: Saveable
Generates the XML Element that the class can be loaded from. The element (which is returned) is NOT attached to the document, merely created.

Specified by:
generateXMLElement in interface Saveable
Parameters:
